commit message: Don't override 'Mark as unread' just because it was marked read to begin with.

Replace ArticleFragments rather than add them.

'Mark as (un)read' gets confused about which one is currently displayed, otherwise.

Merge pull request #291 from kees/server-cached

Implemented authenticated URLConnection

Changed order of menu items:
- Categories and Feeds show Refresh always and All read/Feeds read/Feed read if room
- Headlines shows Refresh and Feed read always and Work offline and so on if room
- Articleview shows Refresh, Star, Publish, Share always and if tablet-view is used also Feed read always

Merge pull request #294 from bacam/mark-as-unread

Try to fix 'Mark as unread'. Can't really reproduce the issue but the patch seems ok to me. Please test with the next update. Thanks!

Fixed Issue #293: 'blank screen when trying to publish articles in firefox'
-> Layout was wrong

Ignore error reports if:
- app is not signed with the key of Nils Braden
- app is not installed from play store
- app is running in an emulator
- app is running with debuggable=true

Make the initial webview transparent to show theme colour

Overrides the default white webview background, which is
otherwise shown until the content is ready.

Several users managed to get invalid values into their preferences and since it not just happens for one or two preferences I'll just reset the whole preferences storage if a ClassCastException is thrown while reading from the store.

Merge pull request #298 from bacam/background-colour-fix

Make the initial webview transparent to show theme colour
Issue #298: Set the initial webview background color to show theme colour
Store a hash of the exception in private filesystem to avoid sending the same report twice or more

Several users managed to get invalid values into their preferences and since it not just happens for one or two preferences I'll just reset the whole preferences storage if a ClassCastException is thrown while reading from the store.

- Push versions of some libraries
- Moved Reset-Operations (Preferences->Menu) into background threads
- Removed deprecated connector based on old apache libraries since these have been removed from the support library as well

- Fixed several lint warnings
- Added backup configuration (backup only ttrss.db and shared preferences)
- Simplified methods Utils.checkConnected() and FileUtils.downloadToFile()
- Simplified the ImageCache in memory, its now just a set of filenames

* Display server-side-cached-images behind http auth
* Slightly adjusted order of menu items
* Fixed Issue #293: blank screen when trying to publish articles in firefox
* Make the initial webview transparent to show theme colour
* Handle exceptions from invalid preference values
* Avoid sending duplicate error reports
* Removed deprecated connector based on old apache libraries
* Moved reset-operations (Preferences->Menu) into background threads)
